meanings: a trend to make light of human life[take life lightly]

vlive.korean: 아무쪼록 인명피해가 없기를 바라면서... Hoping there would be no casualties... 듣기 View video V MOVIE : <아수라> 무비토크 라이브 '< Asura : The City of Madness> Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: Hoping there would be no casualties...

vlive.korean: 진짜 인명 피해 없었으면 좋겠어요. - 더 이상의 피해가 없길 바랍니다. I hope everything is all right. - Hope there are no more damages. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '뇌섹녀가 대세! 문제적 너비'
vlive.english: I hope everything is all right. - Hope there are no more damages.

examples.korean: The drought has led to widespread loss of life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가뭄은 대대적인 인명 손실로 이어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The drought has led to widespread loss of life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Human life must always be sacred. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 인명은 항상 신성시되어야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Human life must always be sacred. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Enemy troops suffered heavy losses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 적군은 많은 인명 손실을 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Enemy troops suffered heavy losses. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Mining can be costly in terms of lives. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 광업은 인명 면에서 희생이 클 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Mining can be costly in terms of lives. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The floods caused a massive loss of life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 홍수는 대대적인 인명 손실을 초래했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The floods caused a massive loss of life. Add to Wordbook
